title: Pitch Deck Designer with Investment & Medical Tech Experience (Canva Expert)
job_overview:
Description:
We’re looking for a highly skilled graphic designer and business communicator to create a high-impact Canva-based pitch deck for a medical technology company presenting to potential investors and stakeholders.

Responsibilities:

Design a visually engaging investor pitch deck (10–15 slides)

Align with our brand guidelines and tone

Collaborate with executive team on content structure

Communicate complex medical/technical concepts clearly

Include market size, financials, team, IP status, product pipeline, and investor opportunity

Requirements:

Proven experience building decks for venture capital or angel investor audiences

Strong Canva design skills (include portfolio samples)

Business, marketing, or finance background a plus

Excellent written English

Experience with medtech, biotech, or health startups is highly preferred

Timeline: Within 7–10 days
Budget: Competitive; open to hourly or project-based
To Apply: Submit your portfolio + a short paragraph explaining your experience with pitch decks and investor communication.
